verses.verse: "Let not your heart <S%G2588><s%> be troubled; <S%G5015><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> in God, <S%G2316><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in Me.

"In My Father's house <S%G3614><s%> are many <S%G4183><s%> dwelling <S%G3438><s%> places; <S%G3438><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it were not so, I would have told <S%G3004><s%> you; for I go <S%G4198><s%> to prepare <S%G2090><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> for you.

"And if <S%G1437><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> and prepare <S%G2090><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> for you, I will come <S%G2064><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> and receive <S%G3880><s%> you to Myself; <S%G1683><s%> that where <S%G3699><s%> I am, <S%G1510><s%> [there] you may be also. <S%G2532><s%>
"And you know <S%G3609><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I am going. <S%G5217><s%>"

Thomas <S%G2381><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> we do not know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> You are going, <S%G5217><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> do we know <S%G3609><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "I am <S%G1510><s%> the way, <S%G3598><s%> and the truth, <S%G225><s%> and the life; <S%G2222><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> to the Father, <S%G3962><s%> but through <S%G1223><s%> Me.

"If <S%G1487><s%> you had known <S%G1097><s%> Me, you would have known <S%G3609><s%> My Father <S%G3962><s%> also; <S%G2532><s%> from now <S%G737><s%> on you know <S%G1097><s%> Him, and have seen <S%G3708><s%> Him."
Philip <S%G5376><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> show <S%G1166><s%> us the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and it is enough <S%G714><s%> for us."

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Have I been <S%G1510><s%> so <S%G5118><s%> long <S%G5118><s%> <S%G5550><s%> with you, and [yet] you have not come to know <S%G1097><s%> Me, Philip <S%G5376><s%>? He who has seen <S%G3708><s%> Me has seen <S%G3708><s%> the Father; <S%G3962><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> do you say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Show <S%G1166><s%> us the Father <S%G3962><s%>'?

"Do you not believe <S%G4100><s%> that I am in the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and the Father <S%G3962><s%> is in Me? The words <S%G4487><s%> that I say <S%G3004><s%> to you I do not speak <S%G2980><s%> on My own <S%G1683><s%> initiative, <S%G1683><s%> but the Father <S%G3962><s%> abiding <S%G3306><s%> in Me does <S%G4160><s%> His works. <S%G2041><s%>

"Believe <S%G4100><s%> Me that I am in the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and the Father <S%G3962><s%> in Me; otherwise <S%G7507><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> on account <S%G1223><s%> of the works <S%G2041><s%> themselves. <S%G846><s%>

"Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, he who believes <S%G4100><s%> in Me, the works <S%G2041><s%> that I do <S%G4160><s%> shall he do <S%G4160><s%> also; <S%G2548><s%> and greater <S%G3173><s%> [works] than these <S%G3778><s%> shall he do; <S%G4160><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> to the Father. <S%G3962><s%>

"And whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G302><s%> you ask <S%G154><s%> in My name, <S%G3686><s%> that will I do, <S%G4160><s%> that the Father <S%G3962><s%> may be glorified <S%G1392><s%> in the Son. <S%G5207><s%>
"If <S%G1437><s%> you ask <S%G154><s%> Me anything <S%G5100><s%> in My name, <S%G3686><s%> I will do <S%G4160><s%> [it.]
"If <S%G1437><s%> you love <S%G25><s%> Me, you will keep <S%G5083><s%> My commandments. <S%G1785><s%>
"And I will ask <S%G2065><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and He will give <S%G1325><s%> you another <S%G243><s%> Helper, <S%G3875><s%> that He may be with you forever; <S%G165><s%>

[that is] the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of truth, <S%G225><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> receive, <S%G2983><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> it does not behold <S%G2334><s%> Him or <S%G3761><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> Him, [but] you know <S%G1097><s%> Him because <S%G3754><s%> He abides <S%G3306><s%> with you, and will be in you.
"I will not leave <S%G863><s%> you as orphans; <S%G3737><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> to you.

"After <S%G2089><s%> a little <S%G3398><s%> while <S%G3398><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> will behold <S%G2334><s%> Me no <S%G3765><s%> more; <S%G3765><s%> but you [will] behold <S%G2334><s%> Me; because <S%G3754><s%> I live, <S%G2198><s%> you shall live <S%G2198><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>
"In that day <S%G2250><s%> you shall know <S%G1097><s%> that I am in My Father, <S%G3962><s%> and you in Me, and I in you.

"He who has <S%G2192><s%> My commandments <S%G1785><s%> and keeps <S%G5083><s%> them, he it is who loves <S%G25><s%> Me; and he who loves <S%G25><s%> Me shall be loved <S%G25><s%> by My Father, <S%G3962><s%> and I will love <S%G25><s%> him, and will disclose <S%G1718><s%> Myself <S%G1683><s%> to him."

Judas <S%G2455><s%> (not Iscariot <S%G2469><s%>) said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> has happened <S%G1096><s%> that You are going <S%G3195><s%> to disclose <S%G1718><s%> Yourself <S%G4572><s%> to us, and not to the world <S%G2889><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "If <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> Me, he will keep <S%G5083><s%> My word; <S%G3056><s%> and My Father <S%G3962><s%> will love <S%G25><s%> him, and We will come <S%G2064><s%> to him, and make <S%G4160><s%> Our abode <S%G3438><s%> with him.

"He who does not love <S%G25><s%> Me does not keep <S%G5083><s%> My words; <S%G3056><s%> and the word <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you hear <S%G191><s%> is not Mine, <S%G1699><s%> but the Father's who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me.
"These <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> I have spoken <S%G2980><s%> to you, while abiding <S%G3306><s%> with you.

"But the Helper, <S%G3875><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> will send <S%G3992><s%> in My name, <S%G3686><s%> He will teach <S%G1321><s%> you all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> and bring <S%G5279><s%> to your remembrance <S%G5279><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that I said <S%G3004><s%> to you.

"Peace <S%G1515><s%> I leave <S%G863><s%> with you; My peace <S%G1515><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> to you; not as the world <S%G2889><s%> gives, <S%G1325><s%> do I give <S%G1325><s%> to you. Let not your heart <S%G2588><s%> be troubled, <S%G5015><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> let it be fearful. <S%G1168><s%>

"You heard <S%G191><s%> that I said <S%G3004><s%> to you, 'I go <S%G5217><s%> away, <S%G5217><s%> and I will come <S%G2064><s%> to you.' If <S%G1487><s%> you loved <S%G25><s%> Me, you would have rejoiced, <S%G5463><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> to the Father; <S%G3962><s%> for the Father <S%G3962><s%> is greater <S%G3173><s%> than I.

"And now <S%G3568><s%> I have told <S%G3004><s%> you before <S%G4250><s%> it comes <S%G1096><s%> to pass, <S%G1096><s%> that when <S%G3752><s%> it comes <S%G1096><s%> to pass, <S%G1096><s%> you may believe. <S%G4100><s%>

"I will not speak <S%G2980><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> with you, for the ruler <S%G758><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> is coming, <S%G2064><s%> and he has <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%> in Me;

but that the world <S%G2889><s%> may know <S%G1097><s%> that I love <S%G25><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and as the Father <S%G3962><s%> gave <S%G1781><s%> Me commandment, <S%G1781><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> I do. <S%G4160><s%> Arise, <S%G1453><s%> let us go <S%G71><s%> from here. <S%G1782><s%>
